data.actual_result: It's sending a blank text and a message by Clyde that the message was not delivered.
data.expected_result: It should post the Spotify embed link and say that the party is over.
data.short_description: Blank text after sharing a song while stopping it
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure to have "Embed Links" permission - Click on the green playing button that is found on the upload files button. - Invite to listen - While the window is opened, stop the song - Go back to the window, and Send Invite.
